sliders.title: Welcome To Quix
sliders.content: Quix is the world’s first truly responsive drag-and-drop page builder for Joomla! Using Quix, you can have your entire Joomla! website up & running in under 10 minutes.

sliders.title: Built for Speed
sliders.content: Combine that with a robust cacheing system and powerful render engine Quix improves mobile page load speeds up to 300%!
